channel.title: Launch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Launch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: SpaceX launches a pair of NASA satellites to probe the origins of space weather
item.description: “This is going to really help us understand how to predict space weather in the magnetosphere.”

item.title: Amazon’s ride on the rocket merry-go-round continues with SpaceX launch
item.description: Amazon has launched 78 of its planned 3,232 Kuiper broadband satellites.

item.title: Rocket Report: SpaceX to make its own propellant; China’s largest launch pad
item.description: United Launch Alliance begins stacking its third Vulcan rocket for the second time.
